caller_intent: Brandi from Alliance Insurance is contacting Miss Cooper to review her upcoming home and auto insurance renewals, confirm policy details, and discuss payment schedules.
resolution_steps: Confirmed Miss Cooper's address and vehicle details (2018 Nissan Kicks) for the auto policy.
Reviewed current coverage (comprehensive, collision, liability, towing, rental coverage) and confirmed she wants to keep them unchanged.
Adjusted payment method from semi-annual to annual for the auto policy.
Notified Miss Cooper about a home policy rate increase due to statewide adjustments and updated coverage limits (from $252,000 to $291,500).
Provided renewal amounts: $1,342.02 for auto (annual) and $1,435 for home (due Sept 14).
Noted that renewal documents had not yet been received and assured follow-up.
knowledge_required: Coverage types (comprehensive, collision, liability, towing, rental)
Rate adjustment mechanisms for home insurance
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance's internal policy management system
Carrier portals for rate and coverage data
summary: Brandi from Alliance Insurance reviewed Miss Cooper's home and auto insurance policies, confirmed coverage retention, adjusted payment terms, and informed her of a home policy rate increase. Miss Cooper had not yet received renewal documents and was unaware of the home policy's due date. The call concluded with a need for follow-up on documentation.
